001011 00000 00001 0100000001001000     # lui $r1
010111 00001 00001 1111010111000011     # ori $r1 $r1   # 3.14f
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $r1 $f1
111101 00001 00010 0000000000000000     # cvt.w.s $f1 $f2
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt.s $f2
00000000000000000000000000000011        # 3

001011 00000 00001 0100001000101000     # lui $r1
010111 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # ori $r1 $r1   # 42.0f
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $r1 $f1
111101 00001 00010 0000000000000000     # cvt.w.s $f1 $f2
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt.s $f2
00000000000000000000000000101010        # 42

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
